extendedInfo.description: The Grand Rapids Eye Institute is a full-scope ophthalmology practice. The Grand Rapids Eye Institute's Medical Director, Dr. Brian Bearie, sets the standard for our entire team. Dr. Bearie is a pioneer in the fields of cornea, cataract, and vision correction surgery. When you visit our office, your eye health is our top priority. Our entire team is dedicated to providing you with the personalized care you deserve using only the latest, most innovative techniques in eye care. We offer a variety of refractive surgery and general ophthalmology treatments to help restore and maintain your optimal vision health. Dr. Bearie also offers cosmetic treatments like newly FDA-approved LatisseT to enhance your eyes' beautiful appearance. Our office participates with most vision and medical insurance plans, including BCBS and all related products, Blue Care Network and all related products, Priority Health, and Medicare. When you contact our office, we will specifically check your individual insurance plan.
